Functions | Properties

Getting an array of achievements unlocked

Functions

(NSArray *) - CrystalAchievements::getAchievementsUnlocked
 Retrieve the achievements unlocked for the current user.
(void) - CrystalLeaderboards::downloadLeaderboardDataForID:
 Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process. Assumes the standard CLTGlobal leaderboard type.
(void) - CrystalLeaderboards::downloadLeaderboardDataForID:leaderboardType:
 Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID and leaderboard type If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.
(void) - CrystalLeaderboards::downloadLeaderboardDataForID:leaderboardType:force:
 Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID and leaderboard type If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will only be updated from the server once every 30 minutes to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.
(NSArray *) - CrystalLeaderboards::top20EntriesForLeaderboardID:
 Retrieve the top 20 entries for the specified leaderboard Assumes the standard CLTGlobal leaderboard type.
(NSArray *) - CrystalLeaderboards::top20EntriesForLeaderboardID:leaderboardType:
 Retrieve the top 20 entries for the specified leaderboard.
(NSArray *) - CrystalLeaderboards::top20FriendsForLeaderboardID:
 Retrieve the top 20 friends for the specified leaderboard, including the current user Assumes the standard CLTGlobal leaderboard type.
(NSArray *) - CrystalLeaderboards::top20FriendsForLeaderboardID:leaderboardType:
 Retrieve the top 20 friends for the specified leaderboard, including the current user.
(NSArray *) - CrystalLeaderboards::random20ForLeaderboardID:
 Retrieve a random selection of 20 entries for the specified leaderboard Assumes the standard CLTGlobal leaderboard type.
(NSArray *) - CrystalLeaderboards::random20ForLeaderboardID:leaderboardType:
 Retrieve a random selection of 20 entries for the specified leaderboard.
(NSDictionary *) - CrystalLeaderboards::currentUserEntryForLeaderboardID:
 Retrieve the data for the current user for the specified leaderboard Assumes the standard CLTGlobal leaderboard type.
(NSDictionary *) - CrystalLeaderboards::currentUserEntryForLeaderboardID:leaderboardType:
 Retrieve the data for the current user for the specified leaderboard.
void CrystalUnityBasic::DownloadLeaderBoardDataForID (string leaderboardId, CrystalLeaderboardType leaderboardType)
 Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID and leaderboard type If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.
void CrystalUnityBasic::DownloadLeaderBoardDataForID (string leaderboardId, CrystalLeaderboardType leaderboardType, bool force)
 Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID and leaderboard type If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.

 Retrieve the data for the current user for the specified leaderboard.

Function Documentation

- (NSDictionary*) currentUserEntryForLeaderboardID: (NSString *)  leaderboardID

Retrieve the data for the current user for the specified leaderboard Assumes the standard CLTGlobal leaderboard type.

Parameters:
leaderboardIDThe ID of the leaderboard as shown in the developer dashboard
Returns:
An array of leaderboard entries or nil if the leaderboard data is not available
- (NSDictionary*) currentUserEntryForLeaderboardID: (NSString *)  leaderboardID
leaderboardType: (CrystalLeaderboardType)  leaderboardType 

Retrieve the data for the current user for the specified leaderboard.

Parameters:
leaderboardIDThe ID of the leaderboard as shown in the developer dashboard
leaderboardTypeThe CrystalLeaderboardType of the leaderboard to retrieve
Returns:
An array of leaderboard entries or nil if the leaderboard data is not available
void CrystalUnityBasic::DownloadLeaderBoardDataForID ( string  leaderboardId,
CrystalLeaderboardType  leaderboardType 
) [inline, inherited]

Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID and leaderboard type If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.

Parameters:
leaderboardIdThe ID of the leaderboard as shown in the developer dashboard
leaderboardTypeThe CrystalLeaderboardType of the leaderboard to retrieve. If this leaderboard type is not configured in the developer dashboard no data will be returned.
void CrystalUnityBasic::DownloadLeaderBoardDataForID ( string  leaderboardId,
CrystalLeaderboardType  leaderboardType,
bool  force 
) [inline, inherited]

Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID and leaderboard type If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.

Parameters:
leaderboardIdThe ID of the leaderboard as shown in the developer dashboard
leaderboardTypeThe CrystalLeaderboardType of the leaderboard to retrieve. If this leaderboard type is not configured in the developer dashboard no data will be returned.
forceSet to true to attempt to force a server-side refresh of downloaded leaderboard data.
- (void) downloadLeaderboardDataForID: (NSString *)  leaderboardID

Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process. Assumes the standard CLTGlobal leaderboard type.

Parameters:
leaderboardIDThe ID of the leaderboard as shown in the developer dashboard
- (void) downloadLeaderboardDataForID: (NSString *)  leaderboardID
leaderboardType: (CrystalLeaderboardType)  leaderboardType 

Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID and leaderboard type If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.

Parameters:
leaderboardIDThe ID of the leaderboard as shown in the developer dashboard
leaderboardTypeThe CrystalLeaderboardType of the leaderboard to retrieve. If this leaderboard type is not configured in the developer dashboard no data will be returned.
- (void) downloadLeaderboardDataForID: (NSString *)  leaderboardID
leaderboardType: (CrystalLeaderboardType)  leaderboardType
force: (BOOL)  force 

Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID and leaderboard type If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will only be updated from the server once every 30 minutes to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.

Parameters:
leaderboardIDThe ID of the leaderboard as shown in the developer dashboard
leaderboardTypeThe CrystalLeaderboardType of the leaderboard to retrieve. If this leaderboard type is not configured in the developer dashboard no data will be returned.
forceSet to YES to attempt to force a server-side refresh of downloaded leaderboard data.
- (NSArray*) getAchievementsUnlocked

Retrieve the achievements unlocked for the current user.

Returns:
An array of achievement IDs or nil if the achievement data is not available
- (NSArray*) random20ForLeaderboardID: (NSString *)  leaderboardID

Retrieve a random selection of 20 entries for the specified leaderboard Assumes the standard CLTGlobal leaderboard type.

Parameters:
leaderboardIDThe ID of the leaderboard as shown in the developer dashboard
Returns:
An array of leaderboard entries or nil if the leaderboard data is not available

Returns:
